Articles.Content:
Well, yes I'm hooked on this, to the point it's probably unhealthy. I've found a few mods that are really good that add chatter and beeps from probes, but couldn't find an official Kerbin

Language. Well, call me crazy- I think a lot of you will, but during missions, especially slip ups lol, I've developed a "Kerbal tongue Speech" which I'd like to try to work into a plugin.

In a nutshell, it's sort of like gibberish (who would have thought) combined with the crazy guy from the old Policy Academy films, with a side of Beavis and Butthead-

IE (ehhh, ugh O, wrung bahton, try red one) would be a complete and normal sentence, or when Bob did a spacewalk and lost sight of the station and re-entered:

(hehh, ehhhh, pritee warm, pritee warm)

so gonna give the plugins a shot at making my first, here's hoping, fingers crossed!

So anyone else have a Kerbal Language they use, or Is it just me who's nuts lol
i've heard that kerbals speak backwards spanish.

I believe the "official" Kerbal language is backwards Spanish.

LoÃƒÂ±apse sÃƒÂ©ver la se "laicifo" labreK ejaugnel le euq oerc.

No, I am not a Spanish speaker, I just used Google Translate.
And remember, it's spanish recorded and played backwards, This is not going to sound anything like what spelling spanish backwards would sound like.

Habla no Espan whatever lol, so I'll call it Kerbin Space Madness Chatter, or something lol.

Just started looking at how everything fits together, def. not a 2 day mod lol, Once I have a foundation I'll start posting in the

Mods forum, and maybe even start a blog!

Thanks all!

And remember, it's spanish recorded and played backwards, This is not going to sound anything like what spelling spanish backwards would sound like.

This.

People don't seem to understand this in any way...
